trans-unit.source: Client configuration
Client ID
Client secret
Client scopes (comma separated list)
Endpoints configuration
Authorization endpoint
Token endpoint
User info endpoint
Logout endpoint
Role
Admin role : The role used to determine TYPO3 admin users.
Token
User identifier : The property of the ID token containing the unique user ID (default: "sub").
Frontend Authentication : Enable OpenID Connect authentication for the frontend.

Frontend User Must Exist : If ticked, only Frontend Users who are present locally in TYPO3 will be able to authenticate with OpenID Connect. You may need to watch logs to find users who could not authenticate.
Frontend User Default Groups : If a group is selected, Frontend Users with no matching application role will be able to authenticate with OpenID Connect.
Re-enable Frontend users : If ticked, will automatically re-enable Frontend users marked as "disabled" upon successful authentication.
Undelete Frontend users : If ticked, will automatically restore Frontend users marked as "deleted" upon successful authentication.
Backend Authentication : Enable OpenID Connect authentication for the backend.

Backend User Must Exist : If ticked, only Backend Users who are present locally in TYPO3 will be able to authenticate with OpenID Connect. You may need to watch logs to find users who could not authenticate.
Re-enable Backend users : If ticked, will automatically re-enable Backend users marked as "disabled" upon successful authentication.
Undelete Backend users : If ticked, will automatically restore Backend users marked as "deleted" upon successful authentication.
